# stat cpu

Show CPU usage, in cores.

## Usage

```console
coder stat cpu [flags]
```

## Options

### --host

|      |                   |
|------|-------------------|
| Type | <code>bool</code> |

Force host CPU measurement.

### -o, --output

|         |                         |
|---------|-------------------------|
| Type    | <code>text\|json</code> |
| Default | <code>text</code>       |

Output format.
